overview: Relive the excitement of the greatest Yankees ever, the five players who made baseball history: Joe DiMaggio, Yogi Berra, Lou Gegrig, Babe Ruth, and Mickey Mantle. These are five all-American stories of young boys who dreamed past their local sandlot and became heroes to the generations that watched their triumphs and battles. The program includes: "Babe Ruth - An American Legend," "Lou Gehrig - The Iron Horse," "Joe DiMaggio - The Final Chapter," "Mickey Mantle - In His Own Words," and "Yogi Berra - In His Own Words."
title: Yankee Immortals
